Set Confirmation Msg
func:
msg.confirmationMsg = `You have successfully booked a consultation slot
Slot #: ${msg.payload.slotId}
Date: ${msg.payload.day}
Start Time: ${msg.payload.slotStart}
End Time: ${msg.payload.slotEnd}
Below is your appointment...` return msg;

name: Set Admin Confirmation Msg
func:
msg.adminConfirmationMsg = `You have a new booking!
Slot #: ${msg.payload.slotId}
Date: ${msg.payload.day}
Start Time: ${msg.payload.slotStart}
End Time: ${msg.payload.slotEnd}
Below is your appointment...` return msg;
